projects.title: Digital Geology
projects.description: ​Digital Geology is a novel subsurface training platform in Shell, where all sources of subsurface and field data in the Upstream business are used and integrated into a single virtual collaborative environment, complemented with real geological exhibits and augmented reality techniques. It is designed to strengthen skills of Shell’s Petroleum Engineers in subsurface evaluation, reservoir characterisation and model construction at all relevant geological scales. Therefore, Digital Geology serves E&P professionals as a subsurface “flight-simulator” and helps them to make the right investment-decisions.
